user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

last_login_tm = #{lastLoginTm,jdbcType=CHAR} ,

up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
where 1=1 and user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
